column1: 38,Complete Purchase Process for Mobile Brands with Checkout,"Navigate to the home page, select mobile brands, add to cart, choose storage and color options, and complete the checkout process.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 3: Click on link mobileBrands (Apple) -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 9: Fill out user information and complete the checkout process

column2: - Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
- Step 6: Enter input value in input Email
- Step 7: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
- Step 11: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 14: Enter input value in input LastName
- Step 17: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 20: Enter input value in input ZipCode
- Step 24: Enter input value in input City
- Step 26: Enter input value in input State
- Step 28: Enter input value in input Phone
- Step 29: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'

column1: Step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Step 3: Click on link mobileBrands (GooglePixel) -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 4: Click on link GooglePixel7Pro -> Navigate to page 'product page#product/{*}'
Step 8: Fill out user information and complete the checkout process
